replies.body: Just as D is for "damn i gotta get the fuck out of here", D can also be for "dive".

F is for free summoner spell because D is almost always taken by flash

The near required choice usually goes before the more variable one.
Flash has a 52%~ or more pick rate.

>Flash has a 52%~ or more pick rate.

Ummm, it's closer to a 90% pick rate.

F is for Flash though.

D is for Distance.
Flash = D.

F is for Flash.
D is for Die! {{summoner:14}}, Dash {{summoner:32}}, Displacement {{summoner:12}} or 'Don't hurt me!' {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:7}} {{summoner:6}}

People that use the term "F is for Flash" have obviously no idea that 68% of league players put their flash on D.


so....yeah :)

It's pretty much 50/50 from what I've seen, but personally, I will usually have it in D. Couple of reasons for thisâ€¦ 1, I like to put the summoner I will have less time to use/will use more on F, such as Exhaust or Ignite. Flash will then go in D, unless I have Teleport or Heal, in which case, that's the only reason I put Flash on F. 2, if I fumble for a G ping, and accidentally hit F, if that summoner is something like Exhaust, it won't matter as much as if Flash was on F.

Anyway, just why I do things.
